/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades adorned with colorful signs and decorations that add a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active transportation modes. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
